reviewText: Bill Kurtis does his usual great job with this documentary! He tells it like it was and gives us the whole story. Perhaps the Vegas experience would be much better for us if the Boys still ran the town!

This is when the Italians ran Vegas they built it they're very good politicians we were brought up that way I give the movie of 5 stars most of those guys from Vegas that ran Vegas was Kansas City Tony the ant had I crew. But thy really f##kt up His crew F#cut up. This movie is all about Kansas city Crew and year to come!$$$
Outstanding DVD.  Thorough and complete.  It is a serious study of Las Vegas and organized crime.  I strongly recommend it!

I saw this on A$E back in the day...good stuff, mostly credible. Especially the story about Allen Glick, Frank Rosenthal, and Tony Spilotro, which is the true story depicted in the movie Casino!!
Definitely good watching if ur a mob fan in search of the true story!!
